column5: Great location! 1 mile from Love Field Airport, UT Southwestern and Parkland, hospital. Less than a mile from Hilton Anatole. Cozy 1 bedroom 1.5 bathroom 2 level condo (780 sq feet); gated entrance, keyless entry, and covered parking.  WiFi, cable TV with over 120 channels and DVR. DVD player and over 70 DVDs to choose from.
